name: Change In Time
description:
Controls:

  • Left and right arrow keys to move
  • Space bar to interact

Change In Time is a student game created for our Cultural Studies class. In it, you utilise time travel in order see how the actions made within the game affect the state of the future.

It explores social, cultural and environmental problems we face in the world today and informs you about worldly decisions, giving you an opportunity to experience a proactive influence over the future of humanity.
